descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 3.0+[/url]. 
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=7109]Scout Armor[/url]. 
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=10864]Warmage Armor[/url]. 
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=5853]Lord Armor[/url]. 


--
Module for Lorecraft - requires [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft-3.0[/url]+ download to function.

--
[b]Features[/b]
Books for each of the armour types - 3 in total.
Lorecraft dynamic looting (found on bosses only)

--
[b]Load Order[/b]
Ensure this loads after all of 3 of DoODABoOM\'s armor files
author: ScarabMonkey and DoODABoOM

files.name: Lorecraft_DoODABoOM_Armors_1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Remade looting branch - added level requirement here
Removed levels from the levelled list - now all 1 - rely on branch condition instead
